item.title: Familiarity doesn't always mean productive or well designed
item.description:
Clinging to Outlook, Only 25% of Employees Willing to Use Yahoo Mail

At this point in your life, Outlook may be familiar, which we can often confuse with productive or well designed.

How many times have you been faced with a change in software or hardware, and just wish you â€¦
